42.eng-name: The Book of Hunting and Slaughtering

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Adiyy bin Hatim that the Messenger of Allah said:"If you see your arrow in it. And you do not see any other mark, and you know that (Your arrow) killed it, then eat it

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الَّذِي يَرْمِي الصَّيْدَ فَيَغِيبُ عَنْهُ
chapter.eng-name: The One Who Shoots An Arrow But (The Game) Gets Away From Him
